dlgLine.text: You all know why you're here.
<To you> Except for you. I'm challenging you for leadership of the shelter! This organization needs someone who can actually deal with this shitty world, not just play at it.
Those of you who are with me will serve me as lieutenants and reap the rewards. Those who are against me will get the shittiest jobs until you end up dead in a ditch somewhere. Your choice.
<To you>This is a serious proposal... If Regina has overwhelming support, she will be elected as the rightful leader of this place.
The current morale around here tells me that...
I'm afraid the people here aren't going to accept a change of leadership right now.
Given their feelings about our current leadership, the people here would accept this change.
Regina in charge?
Yeah, I don't think so.
Honestly, it can't get any worse.
Let's see. Do I stand to gain anything from this...
No, I don't. I'll stick with the current management.
Yeah. Regina, you've got my support.
So, it's come to this...
I expected you'd pull this sooner or later. And you'll get my support over my dead body - I'm with <charname>.
I can't believe I have to say this, but I'm throwing in with Regina. It's gotten that bad.
Basing my vote on what people are telling me about the leadership here...
I don't think people here will support this change.
As much as I have my doubts, I believe the people will support this.
I've given this some thought, and I believe our only option at this point...
We shouldn't upset the status quo. And personally, I can't support that woman.
Is to give Regina a chance. I'm sorry, <charname>, I can't support you.
The votes have been cast...
The majority of the votes are in favor of removing you from the shelter.
Good. Now, all we need to do is toss my predecessor over the fence and I can start making this place less shitty. I played by your rules, I won - you go!

dlgAnsw.text: Wait! Let's talk! Davis? Someone?! Don't throw me out!
Regina's going to end up killing all of you - and when they throw out your corpse, I'll be there to piss on it.
You sons of bitches! After all I did for you! I want a recount!

dlgLine.text: The majority of the votes are in favor of keeping you as leader.

dlgAnsw.text: Good... Then this meeting is over.
Not so fast, Regina - I cannot let what you did go unpunished.

dlgLine.text: Ah... shit. I wasn't expecting it to go down like this...

dlgAnsw.text: Hmm... You're lucky I still need you. For now, you can stay.
I'm going to shake hands, and I'm going to put this behind us. For the sake of the shelter.
If the people support you so much, they can feed you. No rations for a week.
For attempting mutiny against me, you will be exiled from this shelter immediately.
For your betrayal, I sentence you to death. To be carried out immediately. <Kill Regina>

dlgLine.text: That's more than I would do... A lot more.
Deal.
We're cool for now.
Whatever... I got friends.
I lost... I knew it was a possibility. I'll go.
<Regina touches the bullet wound and collapses.>
...See... see you all real soon.

dlgAnsw.text: <Regina is dragged out and the meeting is adjourned.>

dlgLine.text: I believe this meeting is over.

dlgAnsw.text: <You remain in control of the shelter.>
